name: My World 3D: Low Poly Editor
description:
Every child likes to cube and all parents enjoy helping them build the lego buildings. Everyone loves to play and build, to create something.

The My World 3D: Low Poly Editor game makes it possible.

Mobile is always with you, and therefore your virtual world. In this world, you have buildings, trees, roads, signs, thousands of objects waiting to find the right place for you.

You are the one who creates, destroys, changes, adjusts.

You choose the role of designers, architects, builders.

Create a beautiful world, create a world of your choice, and then if you want action, fight, revive it with our characters and try to defend it from others.

Build and be creative!
publishers: NS WEB DEVELOPMENT DOO NOVI SAD
